wmndsAutocompleteProps.name: id
wmndsAutocompleteProps.description: Required. String of text used for the search in the autocomplete.

wmndsAutocompleteProps.name: query
wmndsAutocompleteProps.description: String of text used for the search in the autocomplete.

wmndsAutocompleteProps.name: placeholder
wmndsAutocompleteProps.description: Text used for the placeholder in the autocomplete input.

wmndsAutocompleteProps.name: loading
wmndsAutocompleteProps.description: If true, loading spinner will be visible in the autocomplete.

wmndsAutocompleteProps.name: isRequired
wmndsAutocompleteProps.description: Indictes whether an autocomplete response is required

wmndsAutocompleteProps.name: selected
wmndsAutocompleteProps.description: If true, the autocomplete will display in the selected state

wmndsAutocompleteProps.name: selectedItem
wmndsAutocompleteProps.description: Text to show in the selected state if selected is true
